Question
========

I toss a pure coin a hundred times. The probability that in at least 60% of the cases cross comes up is approximately equal to

Answerlist
----------

* P(z > 0.6)
* P(z > 1)
* P(z > 2)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P(z > 0.6): Incorrect
* P(z > 1): Incorrect
* P(z > 2): Correct
